docs.title: Module SAAS Base (sadeem_saas_base)
docs.text:
This module contain all common information and funcuinality like root server,
git integration, backup servers, and postgresql servers.

docs.title: 1. Root Server Management
docs.text:
• Server Details: View and manage server information.
  • Monitoring: Real-time monitoring of server status and performance.
  • SSH Operations: Execute SSH commands and scripts remotely.

docs.title: 2. Git Integration
docs.text:
• Accounts: Manage GitHub accounts.
  • Repositories: Clone, pull, and push to repositories.
  • Commits: Track and manage Git commit history.

docs.title: 3. PostgreSQL Servers
docs.text: • Information: PostgreSQL servers details.

docs.title: 4. Backup Servers
docs.text: • Details: Details of backup servers.

docs.title: Module Cloudflare Connector (sadeem_cloudflare)
docs.text:
This module contain all cloudflare functionality.
  • Details: Accounts and dns records.
  • Integrations: Cloudflare API integration, Create and delete records.

docs.title: Module Nginx Proxy Manager Connector (sadeem_nginx_proxy_manager)
docs.text:
This module contain all Nginx Proxy Manager functionality.
  • Integrations: Nginx Proxy Manager API integration, Create, Update and Delete
  • Details: Accounts and host records.

docs.title: Module Portainer Connector (sadeem_portainer)
docs.text:
This module contain all Portainer integration functionality.
  • Details: View and manage portainer information.
  • Environment: View and manage portainer environment information.
  • Images: Define your image configuration.

docs.title: - Create, update, delete stacks.
docs.text: • Docker functions, start, stop and restart

docs.title: Module SAAS Subscription Base (sadeem_subscription)
docs.text:
This module contain all subscription common information and funcuinality customer,
start and end date, state, stages, packages and more.

docs.title: 1. Subscription Lifecycle Management
docs.text:
• Subscription Details: Domain,package, customer, state, etc...
  • Subscription Control: Start, stop and cancel.

docs.title: 2. Integrate with other odoo modules
docs.text:
• Sales and Accounting Integration: Link subscription with Odoo accounting and sales.

  • Sale subscription on odoo website: Auto create subscription for invoiced sale orders.

docs.title: 3. Backup Integration
docs.text:
• Integration: Auto create backup records on backup servers once subscription running.
  • Backups Detail: View, Download and restore backups.

docs.title: 4. Nginx and cloudflare
docs.text: • Integration: Control subscription details of nginx and cloudflare.

docs.title: Module Docker SAAS (sadeem_saas_docker)
docs.text:
This module contain all cloudflare functionality.
  • Details: Accounts and dns records.
  • Integrations: Cloudflare API integration, Create and delete records.

docs.title: Module DB Filter SAAS (sadeem_saas_dbfilter)
docs.text:
This module contain all cloudflare functionality.
  • Servers: DB FIlter servers details.

docs.title: Module SAAS Package Slave (sadeem_saas_slave)
docs.text:
This module is created to be placed on clients addons for controlling it.
  • Control User/Modules.
  • Backup Operations.
  • ByPass login.

docs.title: Module SAAS Package Backup (sadeem_saas_slave)
docs.text:
This module is controlling panel of all backup operations,
it is better to be installed on for exampple seprated VPS.
  • Create/Delete/Download backups.
  • Backup scheduled actions.
  • Amazon S3 Accounts and operations.

docs.text:
Main server details and status, monitoring and run commands

  1. Server Name
  2. Server IP
  3. SSH Username
  4. SSH Port
  5. Sudo - this mean used user is not root and need to add sudo to run root privileged commands
  6. Code server domain
  7. Code server password
  8. Code server port
  9. Server country
  10. Server country state
  11. Password - if servers uses password to open SSH connection
  12. Private key if server uses private key to open SSH connection
  13. Confirm server - Validate connection settings
  14. Cancel creation

  1. Reset to draft
  2. Cancel server
  3. Start monitoring - install required script on remote server for monitoring
  4. Install code server - to browse remote server content and edit files from your browser
  5. Action log count
  6. Command to run text box
  7. Execute command button
  8. Executed command output

  1. Other tab

docs.text: Realtime servers status dashboard

docs.title: 1. Postgresql Server
docs.text:
Postgresql Servers details

  1. Server Name
  2. Server IP
  3. Username
  4. Password
  5. Port
  6. Country
  7. State

Caution

Please make sure you have added this username to pg_hba.conf file and allow remote connection 'if required' in file postgresql.conf.

docs.title: 1. Backup Server
docs.text:
Backup Servers details

  1. Server Name
  2. URL - Complete url 'https://backup.sadeem.cloud'
  3. Username - Odoo Usename
  4. Api Key - Odoo user API key - you can use user password but it is not recommended
  5. Local Backup - Save backups on remote server local storage
  6. Amazon S3 Backup - Save backups to s3 account - Please make sure that s3 backups in configured on remote backup server before enable this
  7. Default Create DB Link
  8. Default Backup DB Link
  9. Default Restore DB Link
